channel.title: Meta Packages: Kicksecure Desktop versus Kicksecure Server
channel.description:
https://github.com/Kicksecure/kicksecure-meta-packages needs improvements:
* `kicksecure-cli` - keep existing package as is * `kicksecure-cli-server` - new package to be added to kicksecure-meta-packages * `Depends: kicksecure-desktop-firewall` * includes firewall that by default opens port 22 (SSH's default port) * security-misc-server [no MAC address randomization] * `kicksecure-cli-desktop` - new package to be added to kicksecure-meta-packages * `Depends: kicksecure-desktop-firewall` - new package to be created * Comes with all ports closed by default. * `Depends: security-misc-desktop` - new package to be created * Might come with MAC address randomization. -> [ticket](https://github.com/Kicksecure/security-misc/issues/184) * `kicksecure-xfce` - keep existing package as is * `kicksecure-xfce-server` [Will not be created.] * `kicksecure-xfce-desktop` - new package to be created * `Depends: kicksecure-cli-desktop`
----

item.title: Meta Packages: Kicksecure Desktop versus Kicksecure Server
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
GitHub - Kicksecure/kicksecure-meta-packages needs improvements:

  • kicksecure-cli - keep existing package as is
  • kicksecure-cli-server - new package to be added to kicksecure-meta-packages
    • Depends: kicksecure-desktop-firewall
      • includes firewall that by default opens port 22 (SSH’s default port)
    • security-misc-server [no MAC address randomization]
  • kicksecure-cli-desktop - new package to be added to kicksecure-meta-packages
    • Depends: kicksecure-desktop-firewall - new package to be created
      • Comes with all ports closed by default.
    • Depends: security-misc-desktop - new package to be created
      • Might come with MAC address randomization. → ticket
  • kicksecure-xfce - keep existing package as is
  • kicksecure-xfce-server [Will not be created.]
  • kicksecure-xfce-desktop - new package to be created
    • Depends: kicksecure-cli-desktop

related:

  • Debian Packages - Kicksecure
  • Split the `security-misc` into `security-misc-shared`, `security-misc-desktop` and `security-misc-server` · Issue #187 · Kicksecure/security-misc · GitHub
